"Perhaps you're just not paying attention when the parrot repeats. Maybe it's time to focus and listen more carefully."
"It's possible that the parrot is not repeating on purpose. Perhaps it's trying to communicate something different or more complex."
"The parrot may not be able to repeat due to a physical limitation or medical condition. It's important to consider all possibilities."
"Maybe the parrot is simply not interested in repeating. Some birds are more independent and less inclined to mimic sounds or words."
"It's possible that the parrot is not being challenged enough. Perhaps it needs more complex tasks or stimulation to develop its repeating abilities."
